posts.title: Low Maintenance Home Care Needed!
posts.tasks: Water plants, collect mail, adjust blinds...

posts.title: Very Affectionate Cat Needs Care
posts.tasks: Feed pet, clean litter box, brush pet...

messages.content: Reply: Are you still looking for a caretaker? I have a couple plants of my own and can be available in your requested time frame :)
Reply: Hi Ranger, yes I am still looking. Can you give me a quick call at 604-333-7874 sometime tomorrow?
